alert.note: Alert for Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 1:53PM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys from Kaltag West. * WHEN...From 8 AM Monday to 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected from Kaltag west. East of Kaltag about 2 inches of snow is expected. Blowing snow will occur across most of the area.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Lower Koyukuk and Middle Yukon Valleys
